programme.desc: South London teenagers (John Boyega, Alex Esmail, Leeon Jones) defend their neighborhood from malevolent extraterrestrials.

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A serial murderer will slaughter a captive doctor's (Cary Elwes) wife and daughter unless the man kills a fellow prisoner.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: A detective (Donnie Wahlberg) races against time to save his son from a sadistic madman (Tobin Bell) holding a group of people captive.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: A kidnapped doctor (Bahar Soomekh) must keep dying Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) alive while a fellow victim (Angus Macfadyen) completes his own maniacal test.

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: Jigsaw may be dead, but his grisly tortures continue from beyond the grave in this nightmarish sequel.

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The horror of Jigsaw lives on in this fifth part in the series that finds a cop taking up the murderous mantle of the late psychopath.

programme.title: Saw VI
programme.desc: With Jigsaw still directing events from beyond the grave, Hoffman emerges as the heir to the killer's twisted legacy. But as the FBI closes in, Hoffman sets in motion a game that is designed to reveal Jigsaw's grand scheme.

programme.title: Saw: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Jigsaw's legacy is fulfilled in this seventh "Saw" film that finds the late maniac's successor targeting a supposed Jigsaw survivor.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Tatiana Suarez
programme.desc: A chronicle of the MMA fighter Tatiana Suarez as she returns to the sport after an injury forced a four-year hiatus; Suarez reflects on her journey from wrestling prodigy to professional athlete in the UFC and the legacy she leaves young women.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: After leaving her all-female island for the first time, Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) discovers her full powers and true destiny while fighting alongside men in a war to end all wars.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) returns to Vietnam and fights his way out with his wife, son (Roland Harrah III) and Amerasian orphans.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.title: She's Out of My League

programme.title: A Ghost Story
programme.desc: A passionate young couple, unexpectedly separated by a shocking loss, discover an eternal connection and a love that is infinite.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a rapidly evolving form of dementia, a contract killer gets the chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer (Jamie Foxx) must race against time to save his kidnapped son (Octavius J. Johnson) from a crew of murderous gangsters.

programme.title: Monos
programme.desc: A terrorized American engineer is held captive by teenaged guerilla bandits in a South American jungle.

programme.title: Wanted

programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.desc: Tita alimenta en secreto a Roberto, el hijo de Rosaura, creando un fuerte vínculo. Mamá Elena desaprueba esa conexión. Durante los preparativos para el bautizo, Mamá Elena recuerda su adúltera relación con Treviño y su trágico final.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: Pilot Brodie Torrance saves passengers from a lightning strike by making a risky landing on a war-torn island. When dangerous rebels take the passengers hostage, Torrance seeks help from an accused murderer who was being transported by the FBI.

programme.title: How the Gringo Stole Christmas
programme.desc: A Mexican father's Christmas celebration goes from merry to messy when his daughter shows up with her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
programme.desc: Determined to prove to his family how much he has changed, a talk-show star (Martin Lawrence) returns to his small Southern hometown for his parents' anniversary.

programme.title: Friendsgiving
programme.desc: Molly and Abbey, along with their crew of close friends, host a dysfunctional Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.desc: Katniss faces mortal traps, deadly enemies and moral choices when she and her closest friends leave District 13 to assassinate President Snow and liberate the citizens of war-torn Panem.

programme.desc: With the annual Hunger Games approaching, 18-year-old Coriolanus Snow is assigned to mentor Lucy Gray Baird. Uniting their instincts for showmanship and political savvy, they race against time to ultimately reveal who's a songbird and who's a snake.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.
